attributes.action: carry out a root and branch rationalisation and simplification of the U.K. tax system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would make it much easier for the public to manage their personal financial affairs. Also, by substantially reducing the numbers of civil servants required to administer the collection of taxes it would increase the yield to the Treasury of tax revenues.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
